ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: I thank Bill Dressler for the pointer to the Cassel reference, Yasemin Akdas for the National Digital Inclusion Alliance white paper, and an anonymous reviewer for pointing me to early work by Scrimshaw and colleagues. Sarah Szurek provided helpful feedback on the entire manuscript. I thank students in my introductory medical anthropology class for helping me work out some of these ideas in our Zoom‚Äêmediated classroom.
